title: 1 BD, Mountain views, Polished kitchen countertops
posting_body: Seize your chance to make these peaceful, pet-friendly apartments set in the heart of Henderson, NV your home.
Conveniently located near the Cadence neighborhood with amazing city views of Las Vegas, make our community your new place to truly live!

Private balcony or patio                                                                                        Featured amenity-Polished kitchen countertops-Oversized closets-Ceiling fans in living areas and bedrooms-Mountain views-Separate dining area-In-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity-Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity-Energy efficient appliances including built-in microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher-Wood-style plank flooring                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Featured amenity

State-of-the-art fitness center                                                                                         Featured amenity-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)-Covered parking                                                                                         Featured amenity-Landscaped courtyard with outdoor seating and firepit-Barbecue pavilion and picnic area-Resident social lounge with shuffleboard table and foosball-Fenced dog park with pet watering station                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity-Worry-free 24-hour onsite maintenance-Onsite playground-Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:
